name: Marble Maze (Brew Software House)
description:
Marble Maze is a procedurally generated maze in which you will navigate a marble through a maze to get to the finish at the other end. The further you get in the game the mazes will get larger, more difficult, and include new hazards! No maze is the same!

Set a high score with your highest level reached! There is no level codes to start anywhere or save points. Collect lives and get as far as you can!
